bibl.title: Papyri, Ethics, and Economics: A Biography of P.Oxy. 15.1780 (P39).
Bulletin of the American Society of Papyrologists

bibl.note: Discussion of the retrieval, distribution, and sale of P. Oxy. XV, 1780 (= van Haelst 448; LDAB 2788), currently in the Green Collection. - Pp. 136-142: Appendix. [Early correspondence about the acquisition of the Rylands papyri.] - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Roberta Mazza, Papyri, Ethics, and Economics: A Biography of P.Oxy. 15.1780 (P39).

Discussion of the retrieval, distribution, and sale of P. Oxy. XV, 1780 (= van Haelst 448; LDAB 2788), currently in the Green Collection. - Pp. 136-142: Appendix. [Early correspondence about the acquisition of the Rylands papyri.] - Avec résumé en anglais.
